Explore Arenenberg!

A short film and four audio reports with Annette Fetscherin and Arenenberg experts provide insights into the site’s diverse past and present. You can visit the station points located throughout the entire site in any order. And there’s always a game waiting for visitors of all ages to play. If you have any questions, please speak to shop staff.

Let’s go!
